Articles.Content: I just realized this, and am probably going to get hated for saying this, but NASA uses the term KSC for Kennedy Space Center, in Orlando Florida! It is a coincidence that we here on the forum call our space center KSC as well but for Kerbal Space Center.

It might shock you to learn this, but...

It\'s not a coincidence. 8)

It\'s not a coincidence. 8)

Or is it?

Or is it?

Dun dun!

In all seriousness, I\'m not sureâ€”as I recall, players started referring to KSC before Squad did, and everyone seemed to realize the duality of the name. I always thought it was an intentional overlap.

It might shock you to learn this, but...

It\'s not a coincidence. 8)

I just never noticed it, so I found it to be a coincidence.
Clearly the Roswell crash was 3 Kerbals from the future, after traversing a wormhole.

Clearly the Roswell crash was 3 Kerbals from the future, after traversing a wormhole.

Don\'t you mean after smashing the control panel multiple times and accidentely traveling through a wormhole?
Sorry too inform you that Kennedy space center is not in Orlando.KSP is basically an island.

KSP is basically an island.

*KSC.
